name: TIC-80 Sudoku
description:
I know sudoku games are everywhere but I didn't see a TIC-80 one so here you go.

If you open up the code there's a bunch of variables at the top that change how the game plays and looks. The source is available on GitHub. You can also find this on the tic.computer website.
